description:
This table stores basic information about the timeout or Procedure Pass.


For timeouts: The answers to the timeout questions, comments, procedure info, verification info and staff info can be found in tables that start with the TIMEOUT_ prefix.


For Procedure Passes: the task information, review status, checkpoints, and other information can be found in tables that start with the PXPASS_ prefix.

columns.name: TIMEOUT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record for this row.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: A serial number for the encounter in which the alert was fired. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: TIMEOUT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of timeout.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Scheduling


Pre-admission Testing


Admission


Preprocedure


Sign-in


Pre-incision


Hand-off


Sign-out


ABO Pre-Organ Arrival Verification (Recipient)


ABO Organ Verification (Recipient)


ABO Organ Recovery Verification (Donor)


ABO Post-Organ Recovery Verification (Donor)


Extra Vessels Pre-Transplant Verification

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created.

columns.name: ATTEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of attestation performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verify


Log Post


Log Complete


Log Addendum

columns.name: VERIF_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of verification data this record will have. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Timeout


Attestation


Screening Form


Organ Check-in

columns.name: STORYBOARD_ID
columns.description: The storyboard record that was used to document the intervention that the timeout record is associated with.

columns.name: STORYBOARD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.

columns.name: UNVERIFY_PERF_DTTM
columns.description: The instant an unverified timeout is performed. When the timeout is verified, the instant it is performed will be stored in VERIFY_PERF_IN_DTTM column of TIMEOUT_VERIFY table.

columns.name: LAST_COMPLETE_DTTM
columns.description: This item keeps track of the date and time when the screening form is completed

columns.name: PXPASS_TARGET_DTTM
columns.description: The scheduled start instant of the target case or appointment associated with the Procedure Pass.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_RQG_ID
columns.description: Stores the donor record for the organ check-in.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_VEL_ID
columns.description: Stores the donor organ for an organ check-in.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_VEL_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores record name (.2)

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_OPO_ORG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) and Organ Procurement Operations (OPO)-defined organ type that was checked in.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Kidneys Enbloc


Left Kidney


Right Kidney


Pancreas


Liver


Liver Split Left


Liver Split Right


Heart


Lungs Enbloc


Left Lung


Right Lung


Intestine


Other

columns.name: PXPASS_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The episode that the procedure pass links to. This will be set for episode-based procedure passes, which are used for linking episode-based tasks to documentation that can complete the task.

columns.name: SMARTFORM_ID
columns.description: The SmartForm used when creating this timeout.

columns.name: SMARTFORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PXPASS_ID
columns.description: The primary Procedure Pass.
